articles.description: Follow live text, BBC TV coverage, radio commentary, reaction and updates from the Winter Olympics in Milan-Cortina.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026 LIVE: Day nine - watch BBC - medals, results, TV stream & updates from Milan-Cortina

articles.description: Scotland were at their wildly entertaining best in the Calcutta Cup win over England. This was their perfect day, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Bewildering, bewitching, bonkers - Scotland's perfect day against England

articles.description: Newcastle United beat Aston Villa in the FA Cup fourth round in a match dominated by a number of controversial decisions without VAR.
articles.title: Aston Villa 1-3 Newcastle: An advert for VAR? How many big decisions were wrong in FA Cup tie?

articles.description: Captain Maro Itoje says England must "learn our lesson and move forward" after their attempt to salvage something from a slow start against Scotland is fatally undermined by a string of errors.
articles.title: Six Nations: Error-strewn England flunk Murrayfield Test in Scotland defeat

articles.description: Tom Banton's 63 not out against Scotland was his breakout innings for England and he says it was down to his increased maturity.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Tom Banton says maturity key to breakout England innings

articles.description: Gerard Deulofeu has not played for more than three years but believes he can make "history" by fighting for a "miracle" comeback.
articles.title: Gerard Deulofeu wants to make 'history' after more than three years out injured

articles.description: After an impressive start to his Arsenal career, BBC Sport looks at whether Martin Zubimendi is the Gunners' most important player.
articles.title: Martin Zubimendi: Is midfielder Arsenal's best player?

articles.description: Team GB's men's curlers move a step closer to securing a Winter Olympics semi-final place as they compile an accomplished victory over Germany.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: GB curlers sweep aside Germany to edge closer to semis

articles.description: A Cardiff weekend combining Valentine's Day and a Wales Six Nations home match would have previously proved the perfect Welsh rugby love affair.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Wales v France - Have people fallen out of love with Welsh rugby?

articles.description: As his team prepare to face his old club Arsenal, Wigan midfielder Matt Smith tells BBC Sport about his FA Cup final winners' medal and the advice Mikel Arteta gave him before he left.
articles.title: FA Cup winners' medal, Odegaard's armband & Pictionary with Arteta
